sentences.en: ...huts with walls of bamboo.
sentences.cn: …竹墙小屋。

sentences.en: An adult pandas eat about 20 kilograms of fresh bamboo every day.
sentences.cn: 一只成年的大熊猫每天要吃20公斤左右的鲜竹。

sentences.en: Bamboo is a sort of hollow plant.
sentences.cn: 竹子是一种中空的植物.

sentences.en: Bamboo is light because it is hollow.
sentences.cn: 竹子很轻,因为它中间是空的.

sentences.en: Be careful! Don't jab his eye out with your bamboo pole.
sentences.cn: 小心! 你的竹竿别捅了他的眼睛.

sentences.en: Do you like bamboo?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢竹子吗?

sentences.en: Each bamboo house was surrounded by a thriving orchard.
sentences.cn: 每座竹楼周围都是茂密的果园.

sentences.en: Everything there is made of bamboo.
sentences.cn: 那里什么都是竹子做的.

sentences.en: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.cn: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.en: His favorite fruits and vegetables as well as 55 lb. of bamboo will be on board for nourishment.
sentences.cn: 除了它最喜爱的水果和蔬菜以外还有55磅的竹子将会作为它在飞机上的食物。

sentences.en: It is well known that bamboo shoots are a panda's staple diet.
sentences.cn: 竹笋是熊猫的主要食物，这是人所共知的。

sentences.en: Pass me a bamboo rod.
sentences.cn: 递给我一根竹竿.

sentences.en: Sadly, bamboo plants die after flowering.
sentences.cn: 可惜的是，竹子开花后便会枯死。

sentences.en: She sometimes uses a bamboo as a stick.
sentences.cn: 她有时用竹竿当手杖.

sentences.en: The bamboo huts here are all built on stilts.
sentences.cn: 这里的竹楼都是架空的.

sentences.en: The bamboo stick has split.
sentences.cn: 这根竹竿披了.

sentences.en: The bamboo whipped back and hit me in the face.
sentences.cn: 那竹子突然弹回打在我的脸上.

sentences.en: The missing parts of the inscribed bamboo slips have not yet been discovered.
sentences.cn: 迄今仍未发现竹简残缺的部分.

sentences.en: The panda's natural habitat is the bamboo forest.
sentences.cn: 大熊猫的天然栖息地是竹林。

sentences.en: The piece of bamboo makes a musical sound.
sentences.cn: 这块竹片能发出悦耳的声音.

phrases.tran_cn: 竹幕（西方资产阶级舆论界过去对我国的诬蔑性用语）

trans.tran_en: a tall tropical plant with hollow stems that is used for making furniture
a tall tropical plant with hollow stems that is used for making furniture
